summary: Verified wallet jar cards uniform height fix. All 11 tests passed. All 4 jar cards now have identical height (223px) and action buttons are consistently positioned at the bottom (19px gap from card bottom for all cards).

verified_fixes.uniform_height: All 4 jar cards now have identical height of 223px (minHeight: 200px + content)
verified_fixes.button_positioning: All action buttons positioned at bottom with consistent 19px gap from card edge
verified_fixes.flexbox_layout: Cards use flex flex-col with flex-grow on balance section and mt-auto on buttons
verified_fixes.compact_design: Font sizes reduced (text-base/text-xl) for more compact but readable design

critical_code_review_comments: WalletPage.jsx line 319: Correctly uses minHeight: '200px' and flex flex-col

Savings shows Available/In Goals, Investing shows Available/Invested, Spending and Gifting show simple balance.
